name: Graze (Polygon Dust Entertainment)
description:
Sheep will poop out gold.

Sheeps will mature from lambs to teens to adults; the older a sheep, the more gold it drops on each poop.

When sheep get hungry (turn blue), press anywhere on the field to place some grass for them to eat; sheep will die if left hungry for too long.

Wolves and bears attack your sheep, reload your shotgun and click on enemies to take them out; don't forget to keep your weapon loaded.

Chickens automatically collect gold for you.

Rabbits automatically plant grass for you.

Dogs will help defend your flock; pet them if they turn blue, it means they're in need of a petting; dogs will die of loneliness if they're not pet.

=======

This is a PROTOTYPE so your feedback is welcome/will determine if we take this into a full game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1sL2njCtdpXrZ93_1m-SlvPlI1hA9hCBRSF7ejMCNebA

=======
